qas.question: Who are cast in Eton's female roles in their productions?
Who is responsible for stage hand duties, lighting, sound, and management?
Which Shakespearean play did the School put on in October 2012?
What are somefemale schools close to Eton?

answers.text: St George's, Ascot, St Mary's School Ascot, Windsor Girls' School and Heathfield St Mary's School

plausible_answers.text: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum

qas.question: What Eton production did the girls from St. George's recently appear in?
Girls from St Mary's School Ascot appeared in which recent Eton production?
Girls from Windsor Girls' School appeared in Which recent Eton production?
What Eton production did the girls from Heathfield St Mary's School recently appear in?
What girl's school was featured in October 2011's Macbeth?

context: In recent years, the School has put on a musical version of The Bacchae (October 2009) as well as productions of <b4_0>A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum<b4_0/> (May 2010), <b5_0>The Cherry Orchard<b5_0/> (February 2011), Joseph K (October 2011), Cyrano de Bergerac (May 2012), <a2_0><b6_0>Macbeth<b6_0/><a2_0/> (October 2012), London Assurance (May 2013) and Jerusalem (October 2013). Upcoming in May 2014 was a production of <b7_0>A Midsummer Night's Dream<b7_0/> . Often <a0_0>girls from surrounding schools<a0_0/>, such as <a3_0>St George's, Ascot, <b8_0>St Mary's School Ascot<b8_0/>, Windsor Girls' School and Heathfield St Mary's School<a3_0/>, are cast in female roles. <a1_0>Boys from the School<a1_0/> are also responsible for the lighting, sound and stage management of all the productions, under the guidance of several professional full-time theatre staff.
